titleStmt.title: The vote, or A poeme royall, presented to His Maiestie for a new-yeares-gift. By way of discourse 'twixt the poet, and his muse. Calendis Ianuariis 1642.
titleStmt.author: Howell, James, 1594?-1666.

notesStmt.note: An imprint variant of the edition with Humphrey Mosley given as publisher in imprint.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "By James Howell".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
